repairedDockerfile:
FROM fedora:23 
RUN dnf -y update 

RUN dnf -y install wget 
RUN dnf -y install tar 
RUN dnf -y install java-1.8.0-openjdk.x86_64 
RUN wget https://apache.mediamirrors.org//jmeter/binaries/apache-jmeter-3.1.tgz

RUN tar -xvzf apache-jmeter-3.1.tgz && rm apache-jmeter-3.1.tgz
RUN rm -f apache-jmeter-3.1.tgz 
RUN rm -fr /apache-jmeter-3.1/docs 
RUN mkdir results 

COPY *.jmx ./ 
COPY *.csv ./ 
VOLUME /results 

CMD ["/bin/bash"]
